name: ip-labs-marketplace
description: Claude Code marketplace for Innovative Prospects development workflows covering React, Astro, Next.js, Convex, and Playwright. Includes 13 specialized review/research agents, parallel workflow commands, file-based todo system, and quality gate severity classification.

plugins.name: dev
plugins.description: Core development workflows, agents, commands, and skills for Innovative Prospects projects. Features 13 specialized agents (9 review + 4 research), parallel workflow orchestration, file-based todo system, quality gate severity levels (P1/P2/P3), and knowledge compounding.

plugins.name: coder
plugins.description: Claude Code skills for Coder development workspace environment. Linux x86_64 container runtime, Docker-in-Docker, Kubernetes CLI, and workspace-specific tools.

plugins.name: astro
plugins.description: Claude Code skills for Astro development. Latest Astro features (v4-v5, mid-2024 to 2025), components, pages, and content collections.

plugins.name: react
plugins.description: Claude Code skills for React development. React 19, React Compiler, new hooks, actions, and modern patterns (2024-2026).

plugins.name: nextjs
plugins.description: Claude Code skills for Next.js development. Latest Next.js features (past 1.5 years), App Router, Server Components, and performance.

plugins.name: convex
plugins.description: Claude Code skills for Convex development in Coder workspaces. Self-hosted Convex, queries, mutations, React integration, RAG, and Chef agent workflows.

plugins.name: playwright
plugins.description: Claude Code skills for Playwright E2E testing. Test patterns, fixtures, page objects, accessibility testing, PM2 test services, and best practices.

plugins.name: graphql
plugins.description: Role-based GraphQL workflow with automatic code generation, .role.graphql naming conventions, and best practices for GraphQL operations with codegen-ts.

plugins.name: nhost
plugins.description: Skills for Nhost self-hosted development, including Hasura CLI in Docker, backend health checks, and cross-environment PostgreSQL extension patterns (Nhost Cloud, CNPG).
